Key: Here's the game I borrowed from you. Thanks.
Right. I had lent it to you. How was it?
Sorry, but I actually stopped in the middle.

No, it was great, but it lost some points with me
in terms of the female characters.

Really? I thought the graphics were decently
good.

It's not that! It doesn't hit me right here!
Look around you, Itsuka!

Tohka-chan, Tobiichi, Tokisaki-san, Kotori-chan,
Yoshino-chan and Kaguya-chan and Yuzuru-chan
and Miku-tan! That's a first-class list, ya know?
You expect me to swoon from girls in a game?!

Since you mentioned Tohka, she played this
game quite a bit, so it could be a conversation
starter. Not if you didn't finish it, though.

...Sorry, Itsuka. Let me borrow it one more
time. I'll head home and pull an all-nighter
to clear it.
